## üöÄ Webhook Social Media Publisher

**‚úÖ Sequential Platform Routing + Response Handling:**
1Ô∏è‚É£ **X** ‚Üí 2Ô∏è‚É£ **Facebook** ‚Üí 3Ô∏è‚É£ **LinkedIn** ‚Üí 4Ô∏è‚É£ **Instagram** ‚Üí 5Ô∏è‚É£ **Telegram**

**üîß Fixed Issues:**
‚úÖ **Platform-specific response parsing**
‚úÖ **LinkedIn activityId detection** 
‚úÖ **Facebook post URL generation**
‚úÖ **Debug logging for troubleshooting**
‚úÖ **Raw response included in output**

**Webhook Format:**
```json
{
  "platform": "linkedin",
  "content": "Your LinkedIn message"
}
```

**Expected Response:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "platform": "linkedin",
  "postId": "urn:li:activity:123",
  "postUrl": "https://linkedin.com/feed/update/...",
  "rawResponse": {...}
}
```
